login.title: Log in to Your Account
login.description: Log in to the b.rx platform, from regulatory reporting to regulatory intelligence
login.noAccountDescription: Log in to the b.rx platform, from regulatory reporting to regulatory intelligence

errors.failLogin: Your name and / or password are not correct
errors.unverifiedByAdmin: Your account must be verified by an administrator
errors.locked: Sorry your account is currently locked, please contact your administrator for help

verifyname.title: Your name is now confirmed!
verifyname.description: You can now log in and enjoy the b-fine experience.

failverifyname.title: There was a problem during the validation of your name!
failverifyname.description: Please go back to your mailbox if your account is not yet activated and click on the link. If your account is already active, you can simply log in.

expiredverifyname.title: Your address verification has expired
expiredverifyname.description: Please click on the link below to send a new name to validate your e-mail address.

resetpassword.title: Reset your password
resetpassword.description: Please fill in the fields below to get a new password.

createpassword.title: Create your password
createpassword.description: Please fill in the fields below to create your password.

invitation.title: Confirm your new invitation
invitation.description: Please fill in the fields below to get a new password.

forgotPassword.title: Forgot your password?
forgotPassword.description: No worries, we'll send you a recovery link.

send.title: Confirmation name sent !
send.description: Your account has been successfully reset. To complete the process, please verify your name address for a new validation request.

errors.unverified: Unverified account - please check your name

signin.title: Create a new account
signin.description: Let us prepare you so that you can start creating your first integrated reporting experience.
signin.passwordTempLabelInputTitle: Enter the password you received in your name invitation
signin.alreadyAccountDescription: Login to your account to continue working on your regulatory reports.

errors.alreadyRegistered: This user is already registered! If this is your account, please login.
errors.invalidType: Your user type is not valid
errors.invalidConfirmPassword: Your password confirmation does not match the password
errors.invalidConfirmPasswordShort: Your password confirmation is too short
errors.condition: You have to agree with our Terms & Conditions

name.title: Confirm your name!
name.description: Your account has been successfully registered. To complete the process please check your name for a validation request.

reset.success: Your password has been reset, you can now log in.

verify.success: Your account has been verified, you can now log in.
verify.alreadyVerified: Your account has already been verified!
